channel.title: How do i run a 508 server?
channel.description:
hi, i tried running a [508] server it doesnt work, it gets stuck.. can you tell me what is a [508] server and how do i run it or play on it? do i run it on normal moparscape or do i need something else?
thanks, Candy

item.title: How do i run a 508 server?
item.dc:creator: @candy candy
item.description:
@candy wrote:

well i kinda got it working, i just need a good HD525 client, i have one but when i run and click somewhere my character just walks into any random direction without stopping, or havving any clips (meaning the character walks through walls)
